item.title: Comment on How to start a Gift Shop successfully in India by Vyapar App
item.dc:creator: Vyapar App
item.description: Hi Ghanshyam Varma, Thank you for your lovely note. It made our day here at Vyapar. We are happy to hear that our business tips were really helpful for you. We strive to be the best in everything to our Small Businessmen. Thank you again for sharing such a positive experience.
item.content:encoded:
Hi Ghanshyam Varma, Thank you for your lovely note. It made our day here at Vyapar. We are happy to hear that our business tips were really helpful for you.
We strive to be the best in everything to our Small Businessmen. Thank you again for sharing such a positive experience.

item.title: Comment on How to start a Gift Shop successfully in India by radhe gold
item.dc:creator: radhe gold
item.description: hey team vyapar, I am ghanshyam Varma and I am very surprised to See a team so supporting. I thank you for such great business tips which are really good and helpful.thanks
item.content:encoded:
hey team vyapar,
I am ghanshyam Varma and I am very surprised to See a team so supporting.
I thank you for such great business tips which are really good and helpful.thanks
